MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens affecting properties in Bourne Gardens, Emmett Street and Sherdley Road. Due to complications on site there has been a delay in the start time of the emergency shutdown which is necessary to complete repairs on the undergound network. This will now commence at 1:00pm and we expect restoration by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:57am on 2nd March 2021.
